member.name: LOGPALETTE
member.summary: The LOGPALETTE structure defines a logical palette.

member.name: LOGPALETTE.palVersion
member.summary: The version number of the system.

member.name: LOGPALETTE.palNumEntries
member.summary: The number of entries in the logical palette.

member.name: LOGPALETTE.palPalEntry
member.summary: Specifies an array of PALETTEENTRY structures that define the color and usage of each entry in the logical palette.
